orig_text:
[REL]           Levinson, E., "The MIME Multipart/Related Content-
                   Type", RFC 2389, August 1998.
notes: The RFC number cited is incorrect; it should be RFC 2387.

orig_text:
resolution of relative URIs). However, URI-s in Content-Location
headers (if absolute, or resolvable to absolute URIs) SHOULD still
be
correct_text:
resolution of relative URIs). However, URIs in Content-Location
headers (if absolute, or resolvable to absolute URIs) SHOULD still be

orig_text:
Content-Type: multipart/related; boundary="boundary-example";
       type="text/html"; start="<foo3@foo1@bar.net>"

--boundary-example
Content-Type: text/html;charset="US-ASCII"
Content-ID: <foo3@foo1@bar.net>
correct_text:
Content-Type: multipart/related; boundary="boundary-example";
       type="text/html"; start="<foo3.foo1@bar.net>"

--boundary-example
Content-Type: text/html;charset="US-ASCII"
Content-ID: <foo3.foo1@bar.net>

orig_text:
Content-Location: images/ietflogo2.gif
; Note - Relative Content-Location is resolved by base
; specified in the Multipart/Related Content-Location heading
correct_text:
Content-Location: images/ietflogo2.gif
Comments: Note - Relative Content-Location is resolved by base
specified in the Multipart/Related Content-Location heading

orig_text:
Content-Location: images/ietflogo2.gif
; Note - Relative Content-Location is resolved by base
; specified in the Multipart/Related Content-Location heading
correct_text:
Content-Location: images/ietflogo2.gif
Comments: Note - Relative Content-Location is resolved by base
specified in the Multipart/Related Content-Location heading

orig_text:
Content-Type: multipart/related; boundary="boundary-example-3";
          type="text/html"
--boundary-example-3
Content-Type: text/html;charset="US-ASCII"
Content-ID: <4@foo@bar.net>
correct_text:
Content-Type: multipart/related; boundary="boundary-example-3";
          type="text/html"

--boundary-example-3
Content-Type: text/html;charset="US-ASCII"
Content-ID: <4.foo@bar.net>

orig_text: The image reference below cannot be resolved within this MIME message, since it contains a reference from an outside body part to an inside body part, which is not supported by this standard.
correct_text: The image reference below cannot be resolved within this MIME message, since it contains a reference from an outside body part to an inside body part, which is not supported by this standard.
notes:
Unbalanced double qoutes in value for SRC attribute. Both
        images/ietflogo2e.gif
and
        "images/ietflogo2e.gif"
are valid. Quoted version is consistent with other attribute values in this document.
